events.text: You rifle through the papers in the cabinet. Disconcertingly, most are blank, or contain nothing but scribbled lines as if to give only the [b]appearance[/b] of being a document, but otherwise containing no real information.
You are about to close the drawers when one single memo sticks out from all others....

events.question: What do you wish to do with the memo?

events.text: ... that the public should not see and definitely not allowed access to. This is the reason for the memetic protections around the building. If you absolutely must interact with a non-public element, this document can be used as an anti-memetic for a short time...
... Look upon this document ([i]press Q[i]) and you'll activate the anti-memtic.
Remember... anti-memetics can save your life!
You fold up the memo and place it in your pocket.
You decide to leave the memo. Memos are worthless anyway, after all!
You slowly slide all of the drawers closed in the filing cabinet and leave it be.
